id: Projects By Energy Notion Template [BASB Module]
name: Projects By Energy Notion Template [BASB Module]
description: New and improved projects template for Second Brain [PARA] Setups in NotionThis is really great for solo creators and small agile teams. Sometimes your projects don't always have clear end dates, you just kind of do them!This module can be used in your PARA SetupI've left a version of my personal project checklist that you can modify to ensure that you're giving the right amount of energy to the right projects.
